comment: I loved loved loved this class! Do yourself a favor and take her. She is very helpful and super sweet.

She is a wonderful professor, I also took her for ECE3320 and I did fairly well. Some of the work is tedious but I feel like I have learned a lot of useful information not just for teaching reading but for teaching in general. She tends to go on about her past a lot but it's inspirational. I would definitely reccomend and retake this wonderful lady

Prof. Cox is by far my favorite professor I have had since transferring to KSU! Very helpful and understanding. She teaches from her own experiences and helps prepare students for their future! Class required a lot of work, but Prof. Cox will help you through it. She even adjusted due dates for us! (but don't always expect that) Take her class!!
Sandy was an amazing teacher! She really knows what she's talking about and cares a great deal about her students! Wish I could take her again, but I'll be TOSSing in the Fall. Take her!
Professor Cox is awesome!!! She will prepare you for teaching! She is wonderful!!!!!
Fantastic teacher!!!!! Highly recommend taking her class. If you are willing to do the work, you will excel. She teaches you everything you need to know and has so much experience.

I liked her. She loves what she does. There are a LOT of extensive assignments, but if you pace yourself, you'll do fine. I hated the myeducationlab tool that you had to purchase to go along with the course. It was busy work. Other than that, pretty fun.

She has a lot of experience and I respect her but this is a tough class. She grades tough but fair because she tells you EXACTLY how she wants an assignment done.We only used the textbook to do online quizzes and assignments.A project/assignment was due every class and each was very extensive. Final is over book and online quizzes/assignments.

She doesn't teach at all. The entire semester is about students doing presentations, doesn't explain anything, and just sits on a chair a does nothing! Waste of money. She does leaves tons of homework with very vague instructions. I really hope she gets replace.

Mrs. Cox is very sweet.  Learned a lot, and you DO NOT want to miss a class. You will be lost!  Attendance is mandatory. Easy grader. Homework is VERY extensive and VERY time consuming, but once you get started on it, its a breeze.  Can be very overwhelming but great professor!
She is very organized and gives a lot of work/projects. But learned more in this class than any other. Lots of experience. Highly recommend. Attendance is mandatory, but you will not want to miss.

This class is a LOT of work. She overwhelms you at the beginning of the semester and you will have no idea how you're going to get everything done. However, she is a great teacher with a lot of experience. At first I didn't like her, but ended up loving her by the end of the semester. I even made an A! She's very organized and made everything clear

DO NOT take her, specially if you didn't born here. She has a bad attitude and her rules are not the same for everyone in her class. She made me cry every Tuesday that i went to her class. Where hell is she's teaching? somewhere that there's no-one from other cultures.GET OVER IT! She needs to go back to to school, and take a diversity course.
She is a wonderful professor with a lot of experience! She is always willing to help you with any questions. If you come to class and do the work, it is an easy A!

She is a really great professor. There is alot of work she has you do, but that's what college is about. I had this as an 8am sat. class and I was not looking forward to it at all but she made it fun and exciting. She has ALOT of experience and knows her material. She is so nice and a wonderful teacher!  Take her if you can!!!

Run as fast as you can, and don't look back. She is a horrible instructor with nasty attitude. If she likes you, then you have an A. There is a load of works to do in this class, and her grading is just horrible. DO NOT TAKE HER.

She weighs heavily on attendance. She tries to be helpful in giving us all the information we need for the field experience hours and the projects, but she gives us a lot of work. Most of it isn't too hard, just very time consuming. She is kind of annoying, but a nice lady overall.
